title: Understanding Wikipedia
text: Start by understanding what Wikipedia is. It's a free online encyclopedia created by volunteers. Remember, anyone can edit its content.

title: Role in Research
text: Wikipedia provides an overview of topics and concepts. It's a good starting point for general information.

hintAnswer: It can help you identify keywords and concepts to research elsewhere.
title: Keyword Identification
text: While reading a Wikipedia article, identify key terms and phrases to research further in other academic sources.
choices: It can be referred to for unbiased information on any topic.
It can help you identify keywords and concepts to research elsewhere.
It can be used as a sole source since it's so comprehensive.
It can be used as primary source material.
